seo.title: 369 Media House | Digital Solutions Hub
seo.description: Strategic social media, digital campaigns, and communication solutions that drive real impact.

props.text: Social media is crowded, and standing out needs more than trends—it needs clarity. That’s where we come in. We plan, create, and execute campaigns that connect with real people and drive real business growth.

369 Media House is a leading social media Team with a focus on helping political figures and organizations leverage digital platforms to win hearts and votes. With a team of 11 skilled professionals, we provide end-to-end services that include content creation, digital strategy, community engagement and crisis management. Our team is equipped to deliver high-impact social media campaigns for you looking to maximize their digital footprint and engage with the public.

props.title: Interview
props.description: Jordy shares his learnings and best practices for sports social media, based on his 7+ years of experience.

seo.title: About 369 Media House | Digital Solutions Hub
seo.description: About Strategic social media, digital campaigns, and communication solutions that drive real impact.

props.text: 369 Media House is a dynamic media and communications firm dedicated to creating impactful social media campaigns and driving meaningful awareness across digital platforms. Founded with passion and purpose by a young woman leader, our mission is to amplify voices, spark conversations, and connect communities through strategic storytelling and creative digital engagement.

At 369 Media House, we combine data-driven insights with innovative content to help causes, organizations, and initiatives achieve visibility and drive positive social impact. With expertise in campaign strategy, content creation, and audience engagement, we empower brands and movements to communicate with clarity, confidence, and purpose.

We believe in the power of digital media to inform, inspire, and transform — and we are committed to using that power responsibly to support awareness, advocacy, and equitable representation in the online world.

props.description: 369 Media House understood our political messaging and audience perfectly. Their content strategy and rapid response during critical moments helped us stay connected with voters throughout the campaign.
The team is strategic, disciplined, and quick. From content creation to community engagement, they handled our social media professionally and with clarity.
They don’t just post content — they think deeply about narrative and impact. Their digital planning and crisis management support made a visible difference.

seo.title: Services | 369 Media House
seo.description: Strategy, content, advertising, analytics, and digital communication services by 369 Media House.

props.title: Strategy & Planning
props.description: Audience research, goal setting, content calendars.

props.title: Content Creation
props.description: Graphics, short & long videos, copywriting.

props.title: Paid Advertising
props.description: Campaign setup, targeting, bidding, A/B testing (Meta & Google Ads).

props.title: Community Management
props.description: Engagement, responses, loyalty building.

props.title: Influencer Marketing
props.description: Collaborating with creators to reach audiences.

props.title: Analytics & Reporting
props.description: Performance tracking, data-driven insights, ROI measurement.

props.title: SEO Integration
props.description: Optimizing content for search visibility.

props.title: Video Photography
props.description: High-quality video production & photography services.
